ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.gui

Class LifecycleData

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.gui.LifecycleData

  • public class LifecycleData
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a singleton class for the gui, designed to hold state values between activities. This is an alternative to passing objects along with intents. This was a refactoring change from passing objects with intents.
    Author:
    alexanderwong
